meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Papua New Guinea.
meanings.sent1: She exchanged her dollars for pennis when visiting Papua New Guinea.
meanings.sent2: The market only accepted pennis as payment.
meanings.sent3: He found a lucky penny and hoped it would turn into pennis.
meanings.sent4: In that country, pennis were worth their weight in gold.
meanings.sent5: The pennis jingled in his pocket as he walked.
